name: molecularly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to molecules (= the simplest units of a chemical substance): These new drugs were molecularly similar to existing drugs.molecularly targeted Patients with cancer may be treated with molecularly targeted therapies.
More examplesFewer examplesMolecularly targeted therapies reduced the size of the tumours very quickly.The compound is molecularly similar to a common ingredient of cold medications.The genetically engineered animals are extremely similar molecularly to human beings.Only a few of these genes have been completely molecularly characterized.This information can tell us is how the disease might evolve molecularly.
